mapper.select: SELECT A.U_INTG_ID , A.U_NICKNAME , A.U_LAST_LOGIN_IP , DATE_FORMAT(A.U_LAST_LOGIN_DTTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as U_LAST_LOGIN_DTTM , A.U_LAST_TERMINAL_KIND , A.U_LOGIN_CATE , A.U_STATE_CD , A.U_TYPE_CD , B.FL_UNIQUE_NAME as PROFILE_IMG_URL FROM USER A LEFT JOIN FILE B ON (A.U_INTG_ID = B.FL_TABLE_KEY) WHERE U_INTG_ID = #{uIntgId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( U_INTG_ID, U_NICKNAME, U_LAST_LOGIN_IP, U_LAST_LOGIN_DTTM, U_LAST_TERMINAL_KIND, U_LOGIN_CATE, U_STATE_CD, U_TYPE_CD, U_REG_ID, U_REG_DATE, U_MOD_ID, U_MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{uIntgId}, NULL, #{uLastLoginIp}, NOW(), #{uLastTerminalKind}, NULL, #{uStateCd}, #{uTypeCd}, 'SYSTEM', NOW(), 'SYSTEM', NOW() )
